casebody.data:
TRAIN et al. v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 4, 1902.) No. 27. Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Albert Comstock, for appellant. D. Frank Lloyd, for the United States.

Before WALLACE and LAOOMBE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision of circuit court affirmed, on opinion below. 107 Fed. 261.
